title: Microsoft.DataFactory
description: Microsoft Azure Data Factory Resource Types

dataFactories.description: The top level DataPipeline resource container.

id.description: Resource id of the data factory.  The Id property is set by the server and readonly on the client side.

location.description: Data center location of the data factory.

linkedServices.description: Defines the information needed for Data Factory to connect to external resources.

datasets.description: A named reference/pointer to the data to be used as an input or an output of an Activity. Datasets identify data structures within different data stores including tables, files, folders and documents.

dataPipelines.description: A logical grouping of Activities. that operate as a unit that together perform a task.

hubName.description: The name of the Hub that this linked service belongs to.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

sasUri.description: SAS URI of the Azure Storage resource.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

accessKey.description: The Azure Batch account access key.

linkedServiceName.description: The azure storage linked service name.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

hDInsightSchemaGenerationProperties.description: Schema generation options for activities that execute against HDInsight clusters.

alterSchema.description: Flag to indicate if alter schema should be performed.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

hcatalogLinkedServiceName.description: The name of Azure SQL linked service that point to the HCatalog database.

schemaGeneration.description: Define what options to use for generating/altering table for an input and output tables for an HDInsight activity.

onPremisesFileServerLinkedService.description: An on-premises file system linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

encryptedCredential.description: Encrypted credential which contains host, userId and password.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

userName.description: The on-premises Windows authentication user name.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

userName.description: The on-premises Windows authentication user name.

mlEndpoint.description: The Batch Execution REST URL for an Azure ML Web Service endpoint.

apiKey.description: The API key for accessing the Azure ML model endpoint.

updateResourceEndpoint.description: The Update Resource REST URL for an Azure ML Web Service endpoint.

onPremisesPostgreSqlLinkedService.description: Linked service for PostgreSql data source.

onPremisesMySqlLinkedService.description: Linked service for MySQL data source.

hdInsightOnDemandLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.HDInsightOnDemandLinkedService
hdInsightOnDemandLinkedService.description: The properties for the HDInsight linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

clusterType.description: Gets or sets the flavor for the HDInsight cluster.

hiveCustomLibrariesContainer.description: The name of the blob container that contains custom jar files for HIVE consumption.

coreConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for core configuration.

hBaseConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for HBase configuration.

hdfsConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for Hdfs configuration.

hiveConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for HIVE configuration.

mapReduceConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for mapreduce configuration.

oozieConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for oozie configuration.

stormConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for Storm configuration.

sparkConfiguration.description: The Spark service configuration of this HDInsight cluster.

yarnConfiguration.description: Allows user to override default values for YARN configuration.

additionalLinkedServiceNames.description: Specify additional Azure storage accounts that need to be accessible from the cluster.

hcatalogLinkedServiceName.description: The name of Azure SQL linked service that point to the HCatalog database.

schemaGeneration.description: Define what options to use for generating/altering table for an input and output tables for an HDInsight activity.

dataNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Data Node.

headNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Head Node.

zookeeperNodeSize.description: Gets or sets the size of the Zookeeper Node.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of operating system installed on cluster nodes.

sshPublicKey.description: Gets or sets the public key to be used for SSH.

sshUserName.description: Gets or sets SSH user name.

host.description: One or more IP addresses or host names of the Cassandra server. Specify a comma-separated list of IP addresses and/or host names if attempting to connect to multiple servers. Each server is a replica.

port.description: The TCP port number that the Cassandra server uses to listen for client connections. The default value is 9042.

authenticationType.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the Cassandra database. Must be Basic or Anonymous.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Basic authentication.

azureDataLakeStoreLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureDataLakeStoreLinkedService
azureDataLakeStoreLinkedService.description: Azure Data Lake Store linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

authorization.description: OAuth authorization that may be used by ADF to access resources on your behalf. Each authorization is unique and may only be used once.

sessionId.description: OAuth session ID from the oauth authorization session. Each session id is unique and may only be used once.

subscriptionId.description: Data Lake Store account subscription ID (if different from Data Factory account).

resourceGroupName.description: Data Lake Store account resource group name (if different from Data Factory account).

azureDataLakeAnalyticsLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureDataLakeAnalyticsLinkedService
azureDataLakeAnalyticsLinkedService.description: Azure Data Lake Analytics linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

authorization.description: OAuth authorization that may be used by ADF to access resources on your behalf. Each authorization is unique and may only be used once.

sessionId.description: OAuth session ID from the oauth authorization session. Each session id is unique and may only be used once.

subscriptionId.description: Data Lake Analytics account subscription ID (if different from Data Factory account).

resourceGroupName.description: Data Lake Analytics account resource group name (if different from Data Factory account).

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

url.description: The URL of the web service endpoint, e.g. http://www.microsoft.com.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the web table source. Possible values are: Anonymous and Basic.

apiKey.description: Deprecated. WebApi-based authentication is no longer supported.

hdfsLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.HdfsLinkedService
hdfsLinkedService.description: Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

url.description: The URL of the HDFS service endpoint, e.g. http://myhostname:50070/webhdfs/v1.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the HDFS. Possible values are: Anonymous, and Windows.

encryptedCredential.description: The encrypted credential for Windows authentication.

onPremisesOdbcLinkedService.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.OnPremisesOdbcLinkedService
onPremisesOdbcLinkedService.description: On-premises Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) linked service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the ODBC data store. Possible values are: Anonymous and Basic.

connectionString.description: The non-access credential portion of the connection string as well as an optional encrypted credential.

credential.description: The access credential portion of the connection string specified in driver-specific property-value format.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

url.description: The URL of the OData service endpoint.

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the OData service.

username.description: User name of the OData service.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this linked service type.

username.description: The username for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

password.description: The password for Basic authentication of the Salesforce source.

securityToken.description: The security token is required to access Salesforce.

dataElement.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Common.Models.DataElement
dataElement.description: Data element defines the semantics of each column of a dataset.

dateTimePartitionValue.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.DateTimePartitionValue
dateTimePartitionValue.description: The date/time value of a partition.

format.description: Format string for the Date value.

storageFormat.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.StorageFormat
storageFormat.description: The format definition of a storage.

encodingName.description: The code page name of the preferred encoding. If miss, the default value is utf-8, unless BOM denotes another Unicode encoding. Refer to the Name column of the table in the following link to set supported values: https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.text.encoding.aspx.

jsonFormat.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.JsonFormat
jsonFormat.description: The data stored in JSON format.

filePattern.description: File pattern of JSON. To be more specific, the way of separating a collection of JSON objects. The default value is 'setOfObjects'. It is case-sensitive.

nestingSeparator.description: The character used to separate nesting levels. Default value is '.' (dot).

encodingName.description: The code page name of the preferred encoding. If not provided, the default value is 'utf-8', unless the byte order mark (BOM) denotes another Unicode encoding. The full list of supported values can be found in the 'Name' column of the table of encodings in the following reference: https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.text.encoding.aspx#Anchor_5.

jsonFormatFilePattern.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.JsonFormatFilePattern
jsonFormatFilePattern.description: JSON format file pattern. A property of JsonFormat

compression.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.Compression
compression.description: The compression method used on a dataset.

bzip2Compression.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.BZip2Compression
bzip2Compression.description: The BZip2 compression method used on a dataset.

deflateCompression.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.DeflateCompression
deflateCompression.description: The Deflate compression method used on a dataset.

level.description: The Deflate compression method used on a dataset.

gzipCompression.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.GZipCompression
gzipCompression.description: The GZip compression method used on a dataset.

level.description: The GZip compression method used on a dataset.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

folderPath.description: The path of the Azure blob storage.

fileName.description: The name of the Azure blob.

partitionedBy.description: The partitions to be used by the path.

format.description: The format of the Azure blob storage.

compression.description: The data compression method used for the blob storage.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

tableName.description: The table name of the Azure table storage.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

tableName.description: The table name of the Azure SQL data warehouse dataset.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this data set type.

folderPath.description: Path to the folder in the Azure Data Lake Store.

fileName.description: The name of the file in the Azure Data Lake Store.

format.description: The format of the Data Lake Store.

compression.description: The data compression method used for the item(s) in the Azure Data Lake Store.

partitionedBy.description: Specify a dynamic path and filename for time series data.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

tableName.description: The table name of the on-premises SQL database.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

folderPath.description: The name of the file folder.

partitionedBy.description: The partitions to be used by the path.

compression.description: The data compression method used on files.

onPremisesCassandraTableDataset.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.OnPremisesCassandraTableDataset
onPremisesCassandraTableDataset.description: A table in a Cassandra database.

tableName.description: The table name of the Cassandra database.

keyspace.description: The keyspace of the Cassandra database.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

tableName.description: The table name of the on-premises Oracle database.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.
Properties specific to this dataset type.

webTableDataset.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.WebTableDataset
webTableDataset.description: HTML table in a web page.

typeProperties.description: Properties specific to this dataset type.

index.description: The zero-based index of the table in web page.

path.description: The relative URL to the web page from the linked service URL.

partitionedBy.description: The partitions to be used by the path.

frequency.description: Frequency in terms of minute, hour, day, etc.

interval.description: The interval of running the scheduler.

anchorDateTime.description: The date used as a reference point for calculating slice start and end dates.

offset.description: The offset relative to the anchor time.

validationPriorityOrder.description: Validation priority order.  Choose from OldestFirst or NewestFirst.

retryTimeout.description: Specifies the timeout for the activity to run. If there is value specified, it takes the value of TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1) which means indefinite timeout.

structure.description: Columns that define the structure of the dataset.

external.description: If set to true, the dataset is an external data set.

timeout.description: Specifies the timeout for the activity to run. If there is value specified, it takes the value of TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1) which means indefinite timeout.

delay.description: Delay activity execution so that upstream activities can have extra time to finish.

concurrency.description: The maximum number of concurrent activity executions.

executionPriorityOrder.description: Execution priority order.  Choose from OldestFirst or NewestFirst.

retry.description: Total number of short retries for a failed activity.

longRetry.description: Total number of long retries after failed short retries.

linkedServiceName.description: LinkedService name where the Activity Runs.

frequency.description: Frequency in terms of minute, hour, day, etc.

interval.description: The interval of running the scheduler.

anchorDateTime.description: The date used as a reference point for calculating slice start and end dates.

offset.description: The offset relative to the anchor time.

azureTableSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureTableSource
azureTableSource.description: A copy activity Azure table source.

azureTableSourceIgnoreTableNotFound.description: Azure table source ignore table not found.

skipHeaderLineCount.description: Number of header lines to skip from each blob

recursive.description: If true, files under the folder path will be read recursively.

documentDbCollectionSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.DocumentDbCollectionSource
documentDbCollectionSource.description: A copy activity Document Database Collection source.

relationalSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.RelationalSource
relationalSource.description: A copy activity source for various relational databases.

sqlReaderStoredProcedureName.description: Name of the stored procedure for a SQL Database source. This cannot be used at the same time as SqlReaderQuery.

storedProcedureParameters.description: Value and type setting for stored procedure parameters. Example: "{Parameter1: {value: "1", type: "int"}}".

sqlDWSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.SqlDWSource
sqlDWSource.description: A copy activity SQL Data Warehouse source.

sqlReaderStoredProcedureName.description: Name of the stored procedure for a SQL Data Warehouse source. This cannot be used at the same time as SqlReaderQuery.

storedProcedureParameters.description: Value and type setting for stored procedure parameters. Example: "{Parameter1: {value: "1", type: "int"}}".

fileSystemSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.FileSystemSource
fileSystemSource.description: A copy activity file system source.

recursive.description: If true, files under the folder path will be read recursively.

webSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.WebSource
webSource.description: A copy activity source for web page table.

azureDataLakeStoreSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureDataLakeStoreSource
azureDataLakeStoreSource.description: A copy activity Azure Data Lake source.

recursive.description: If true, files under the folder path will be read recursively.

cassandraSource.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.CassandraSource
cassandraSource.description: A copy activity source for a Cassandra database.

query.description: Database query. Should be a SQL-92 query expression or Cassandra Query Language (CQL) command.

consistencyLevel.description: The consistency level specifies how many Cassandra servers must respond to a read request before returning data to the client application. Cassandra checks the specified number of Cassandra servers for data to satisfy the read request. Must be one of cassandraSourceReadConsistencyLevels. The default value is 'ONE'. It is case-insensitive.

cassandraSourceReadConsistencyLevels.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.CassandraSourceReadConsistencyLevels
cassandraSourceReadConsistencyLevels.description: Consistency level when connecting to the Cassandra database. A property of CassandraSource.

azureDataLakeStoreSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureDataLakeStoreSink
azureDataLakeStoreSink.description: A copy activity Azure Data Lake Store sink.

copyBehavior.description: The type of copy behavior for copy sink.

azureQueueSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureQueueSink
azureQueueSink.description: A copy activity Azure queue sink.

copyBehaviorType.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.CopyBehaviorType
copyBehaviorType.description: All available types of copy behavior.

azureTableSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureTableSink
azureTableSink.description: A copy activity Azure table sink.

azureTableDefaultPartitionKeyValue.description: Azure table default partition key value.

copyBehavior.description: The type of copy behavior for copy sink.

fileSystemSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.FileSystemSink
fileSystemSink.description: A copy activity file system sink.

copyBehavior.description: The type of copy behavior for file system sink.

documentDbCollectionSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.DocumentDbCollectionSink
documentDbCollectionSink.description: A copy activity Document Database Collection sink.

sliceIdentifierColumnName.description: Name of the SQL column which is used to save slice identifier information, to support idempotent copy.

sqlDWSink.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.SqlDWSink
sqlDWSink.description: A copy activity SQL data warehouse sink.

sliceIdentifierColumnName.description: Name of the SQL column which is used to save slice identifier information, to support idempotent copy.

allowPolyBase.description: Indicates to use PolyBase to copy data into SQL Data Warehouse when applicable.

polyBaseSettings.description: Specifies PolyBase-related settings when AllowPolyBase is true.

rejectType.description: Indicates whether the RejectValue property is specified as a literal value or a percentage.

rejectValue.description: Specifies the value or the percentage of rows that can be rejected before the query fails.

rejectSampleValue.description: Determines the number of rows to attempt to retrieve before the PolyBase recalculates the percentage of rejected rows.

useTypeDefault.description: Specifies how to handle missing values in delimited text files when PolyBase retrieves data from the text file.

sliceIdentifierColumnName.description: Name of the SQL column which is used to save slice identifier information, to support idempotent copy.

typeProperties.description: Copy activity properties.

translator.description: Copy activity translator. If not specificed, tabular translator is used.

enableStaging.description: Specifies whether to copy data via an interim staging. Default value is false.

stagingSettings.description: Specifies interim staging settings when EnableStaging is true.

parallelCopies.description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions opened on the source or sink to avoid overloading the data store.

cloudDataMovementUnits.description: Maximum number of cloud data movement units that can be used to perform this data movement.

linkedServiceName.description: Name of the Azure Storage or Storage SAS linked service used for interim staging. Must be specified if copy via staging is enbled.

path.description: The path to storage for storing the interim data

enableCompression.description: Specifies whether to use compression when copying data via an interim staging. Default value is false.

typeProperties.description: HDInsight activity properties.

defines.description: Allows user to specify defines for Hive job request.

typeProperties.description: HDInsight activity properties.

defines.description: Allows user to specify defines for the Pig job request.

typeProperties.description: HDInsight activity properties.

defines.description: Allows user to specify defines for mapreduce job request.

typeProperties.description: HDInsight streaming activity properties.

filePaths.description: Paths to streaming job files. Can be directories.

fileLinkedService.description: Linked service where the files are located

defines.description: Allows user to specify defines for streaming job request.

hdInsightActivityDebugInfoOption.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.HDInsightActivityDebugInfoOption
hdInsightActivityDebugInfoOption.description: All available options on how to get the YARN logs for HDInsight activities.

typeProperties.description: .NET activity properties.

extendedProperties.description: User defined property bag. There is no restriction on the keys or values that can be used. The user specified .NET activity has the full responsibility to consume and interpret the content defined.

typeProperties.description: SQL Stored Procedure activity properties.

storedProcedureParameters.description: User specified property bag used in Stored Procedure. There is no restriction on the keys or values that can be used. User needs to consume and interpret the content accordingly in their customized Stored Procedure.

azureMLBatchScoringActivity.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureMLBatchScoringActivity
azureMLBatchScoringActivity.description: Azure ML Web Service batch scoring activity.

typeProperties.description: Azure ML activity properties.

webServiceParameters.description: Key,Value pairs to be passed to the Azure ML Batch Execution Service Endpoint (these are also referred to as GlobalParameters). Keys must match the names of web service parameters defined in published the Azure ML web service. Values may include ADF macros to be resolved at each slice execution time.

azureMLBatchExecutionActivity.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureMLBatchExecutionActivity
azureMLBatchExecutionActivity.description: Azure ML Batch Execution Service activity.

globalParameters.description: Key,Value pairs to be passed to the Azure ML Batch Execution Service Endpoint Keys must match the names of web service parameters defined in the published Azure ML web service. Values may include ADF functions to be resolved at each slice execution time (See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn835056.aspx). Values will be passed in the GlobalParameters property of the Azure ML batch execution request.

webServiceOutputs.description: Key,Value pairs mapping the Azure ML endpoint's Web Service Output names to names of ADF Blob Tables where the batch execution output should be written. This information will be passed in the WebServiceOutputs property of the Azure ML batch execution request. Mapped Tables must be included in the Activity's Outputs.

webServiceInput.description: Name of ADF Blob Table giving the input to the batch execution. This information will be passed in the WebServiceInput property of the Azure ML batch execution request.

azureMLUpdateResourceActivity.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.AzureMLUpdateResourceActivity
azureMLUpdateResourceActivity.description: Azure ML Update Resource management activity.

trainedModelDatasetName.description: Name of ADF Blob Dataset representing the .ilearner file that will be uploaded by the update operation. The Dataset must be included in this Activity's pipeline Inputs.

trainedModelName.description: Name of the Trained Model module in the Web Service experiment to be updated.

dataLakeAnalyticsUSQLActivity.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.DataLakeAnalyticsUSQLActivity
dataLakeAnalyticsUSQLActivity.description: Azure Data Lake Analytics U-SQL activity.

typeProperties.description: Data Lake Analytics U-SQL activity properties.

script.description: The U-SQL script. This cannot be used at the same time as ScriptPath and ScriptLinkedService.

scriptPath.description: The path to the U-SQL script in the ScriptLinkedService. This needs to be used at the same time as ScriptLinkedService.

scriptLinkedService.description: The linked service hosting the U-SQL script. This needs to be used at the same time as ScriptPath.

runtimeVersion.description: Runtime version of U-SQL engine to use.

compilationMode.description: Compilation mode of U-SQL. Must be one of the USqlCompilationMode

degreeOfParallelism.description: The maximum number of nodes that will be used simultaneously to run the job.

priority.description: Determines which jobs out of all that are queued should be selected to run first. The lower the number, the higher the priority (minimum is 0).

parameters.description: Allows user to specify parameters for the U-SQL activity.

uSqlCompilationMode.title: Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataFactories.Models.USqlCompilationMode
uSqlCompilationMode.description: Compilation mode for a U-SQL activity.

activities.description: Activities that belong to the pipeline.

start.description: The start time of the pipeline.

end.description: The end time of the pipeline.

isPaused.description: The status of the pipline. Pipeline is paused when boolean is set to true.

hubName.description: The name of the Hub that this pipeline belongs to.

pipelineMode.description: The method of scheduling runs for the pipeline. 'Scheduled' indicates that the pipeline will run at a specified time interval according to its active period (start and end time). 'OneTime' indicates that the pipeline will run only once.

expirationTime.description: Duration of time after creation for which the pipeline is valid and should remain provisioned. The pipeline will be deleted automatically once it reaches the expiration time if it does not have any active or pending runs.

datasets.description: List of datasets to be used by activities defined in the pipeline. This can be used to define datasets that are specific to this pipeline and not defined within the data factory. Datasets defined within this pipeline can only be used by this pipeline and cannot be shared.
